attributes.action: Clear Richard Osborn-Brooks who stabbed an intruder in his home of all charges.
attributes.background: Richard Osborn-Brooks was in his home when burglars broke in. Richard was cornered into his kitchen by one intruder using a screw driver as a weapon. In self defence, Richard was forced to stab the intruder who died as a result. Richard has been arrested on suspicion of murder and granted bail.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The police and the CPS are responsible for deciding whether to charge people with a crime. 

You may find this guidance from the Crown Prosecution Service helpful:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/publication/decision-charge
